meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Committee on Pensions
meeting_info.location: City Council Chambers, 6th Floor, Dallas, Texas; Virtual via Webex

presenters: Dory Wiley, President & CEO, Commerce Street Investment Management
Grant Glover, Investment Analyst, Commerce Street Investment Management
Cheryl Alston, Executive Director, City of Dallas Employee Retirement Fund
David Etheridge, Deputy Executive Director, City of Dallas Employee Retirement Fund
Jack Ireland, Chief Financial Officer, City Manager’s Office

agenda_items.title: Approval of the May 23, 2024 Ad Hoc Committee on Pensions Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Police and Fire Pension System (DPFP) and Employees’ Retirement Fund (ERF): Investment Portfolio Review and Discussion

agenda_items.title: Employees’ Retirement Fund (ERF): Funding Soundness Restoration Plan Update and Consideration of Recommendations
agenda_items.description: Update on the funding soundness restoration plan for ERF and consideration of recommendations.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Police and Fire Pension System (DPFP): Funding Soundness Restoration Plan Update and Consideration of Recommendations
